subject: Apologies
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Milwaukee Brewers slugger Ryan Braun said he had made amends with the specimen collector he blamed at a 2012 news conference for what he described as a “fatally flawed” drug-testing protocol.
snippet: The Milwaukee Brewers slugger Ryan Braun said he had made amends with the specimen collector he blamed at a 2012 news conference for what he described as a “fatally flawed” drug-testing protocol.
